overview: A Night to Remember - A romantic night starts with a limo ride. Ryan starts to get a little bit handsy and finds Zoe totally into the idea of getting it on in a moving vehicle. Two lovers become lost in each other as the car, and their lust, carries them away.  Dripping Wet Girlfriends - Beneath the outdoor shower, Veronica and Chloe explore each other's bodies. When Van Wylde arrives on the scene to join in the fun, the two girls welcome him with open arms to kick off a sultry threesome.  All Business - Arriving home after work, Ryan finds Kinsley and Chloe making out on the couch. When he settles between the two girls, they welcome him with heated kisses and promises of the intense threesome passion to come!  Sexy Surprise - Dressed in next to nothing, Ariana and Marley are ready to seduce. The girls beckon Johnny over as they exchange a kiss. The three undress as they kiss, discovering one another's most sensitive areas, before the passion heats up!
title: Sexy Surprise
